errors.system: An error occurred in the system
errors.404: This page could not be found
errors.permissionError: There was an error processing your request. Please try to refresh the page.
errors.INVALID_İNTERMEDİARY_SWIFT_CODE: İntermediary swift code is not found
errors.NEED_ATTACHMENT: Needs to add attachment for authorization process
errors.DUPLICATE_TEMPLATE_NAME: Template with such name is already exist
errors.TOTAL_FILE_SIZE_EXCEEDED_LIMIT: Total file size is over limit
errors.ACCOUNTS_EQUAL: Credit account must be different from Debit account
errors.CURRENCY_DIFFERENT: Please select accounts in the same currency
errors.TOKEN_EXPIRED: Token expired, please sign in again
errors.ACCOUNT_NOT_DETERMINED: The amount on the account has not been determined, contact the Bank
errors.BLOCKED: Problem with account, contact with Bank
errors.ENDS_WITH_ZERO: The last three characters should not be “0”
errors.ACCOUNT_HAS_DISPOSAL: This account has a disposal, please contact the bank
errors.CUT_OFF_INTERNATIONAL: SWIFT transfers should be approved till 17:00, please make your application on weekdays (working days) until 17:00
errors.CUT_OFF_INTERNATIONAL_URGENT: Urgent SWIFT payments must be made by 16:00, please make your request by 16:00 on weekdays (working days)
errors.NO_APPROVERS_AVAILABLE: There is no authorized user to confirm
errors.DAILY_MAX_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Payment amount exceeds {{limit}} AZN daily limit for this account
errors.MONTHLY_MAX_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Payment amount exceeds {{limit}} AZN monthly limit for this account
errors.APPROVAL_FLOW_NOT_FOUND: There is no authorized user to confirm
errors.PAYMENT_APPROVAL_NOT_ALLOWED: You do not have the authority to approve
errors.PAYMENT_CREATION_NOT_ALLOWED: You do not have the authority to create the transaction
errors.PAYMENT_REJECTION_NOT_ALLOWED: You do not have the authority to reject
errors.CORRESPONDENT_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND: Correspondent account not found, please make you transfer via SWIFT
errors.VAT_ACCOUNT: This is a VAT account, please continue the transaction from the VAT payment

404.title: Sorry, the page you were looking for was not found.
404.description: The page no longer exists or has been moved. Sorry for the inconvenience. You can return to the home page.
